message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a little steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 might be a bit high for you. However, I'm still willing to sell the product to you, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $130. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  However, $130 is still a bit more than I'm looking to spend.  Would you consider $110?
I understand that $130 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $125. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope you'll consider it!
